summary: A short mod I made over about 2 days. It is the story of man\'s grandfather who was never put to rest.
descriptionHtml:
BACKGROUND:
I made this mod in about 2 days while working on a Biology project, so as you can expect there are some bugs. I am currently releasing this to see if anyone finds some more bugs, or has some recommendations for the mod. It is in early BETA. This means it is currently in a heavy testing phase, and is still under development.

STORY:
The main part of the story can be found upon entering Jargrief\'s Crypt. There are 2 books when you enter. The one to your left explains the story, and the one to the right is basically a longer copy of the above. 

FUTURE ADDITIONS:
Later on I will be adding 2 more crypts, and making the current one much more complex. Right now it is a + shape, and is very boring. This is my first mod, so please no raging at it.

BUG TESTING:
If you find any bugs, then please put them in the comments for this mod. All help is appreciated, so please do not withhold a bug because you think it has already been found. I may believe it is fixed only to find out it was persisting.

QUEST START:
Talk to Johansson Pickstorm in the Bannered Mare Inn.

OTHER:
Please check out my YouTube channel here: http://www.youtube.com/user/numberboxgamer

The SEQ File:
YOU MUST ADD THE SEQ FILE TO YOUR DATA FOLDER. When it is downloaded you will get a .zip file. Extract it, and place the QSP folder directly into your data folder. I do not know why this has to happen, but it does.

CHANGELOG:
Version 0.1
*Fixed broken dialog  
*Fixed lighting glitches  
*Fixed broken Draugrs  

Version 0.0.1
*Main Release
author: NumberBoxGamer
